attributes.action: Mandatory drug testing for all M.Ps including ministers and Lords.
attributes.additional_details: These days drug testing is mandatory in many sectors of employment. Drugs are present in all sections of society. Drug use can seriously impair judgement and cause mental illness. People in charge of a cement mixer are expected to pass a drug test. As should the people in charge of the country.
attributes.background: Implement regular drug testing for all active members of parliament, including ministers and Lords.
